title: ActivityWatch App Names Configuration
description: Configuration for browser and editor app name mappings used in canonical queries

browsers.description: Browser app names for matching window events. Key is the browser type, value is an array of possible app names.

editors.description: Editor app names for matching window events. Key is the editor type, value is an array of possible app names.

bucketDetection.description: Patterns for detecting browser/editor type from bucket IDs

browsers.description: Browser detection patterns. Key is browser type, value is array of strings to search for in bucket ID.

editors.description: Editor detection patterns. Key is editor type, value is array of strings to search for in bucket ID.
